meta.article_title: February 27, 2012 - Opening Up the Forehand Zone

opening-up-the-forehand-zone.probleme: Awkward forehand stroke due to backhand stance

debutant.nom: Drill with partner: side-to-side hits and forehand/backhand alternation

exercices_complementaires.description: Alternate hitting backhands and forehands to the same spot, focusing on opening up the forehand zone.
Have partner hit ball randomly to forehand and backhand, focusing on proper forehand zone opening.

metriques_progression: Developing habit of opening up the forehand zone
